data.title: Writing
data.text:
Brian has published

With more than one hundred books to his credit, Brian Aldiss is one of the most prolific British writers of modern times. This section of the site contains hundreds of pages of information about Brianâ€™s books and hundreds of cover images arranged into galleries, use the menu to the left to go to the books that interest you.

41 Novels & novellas

26 Volumes of stories

13 Non-fiction books

8 Volumes of poetry

18 Small works

40 Anthologies
